title: New: Ecstasy – The Funeral (Band of Horses Cover)
content: Remember when Avec Sans introduced themselves to the world with their revamped, electro-pop version of Bon Iver’s Perth? Well it would appear that turning beautiful indie numbers into dance anthems is catching, as UK outfit Ecstasy try their hand at Band Of Horses The Funeral. I’ll admit to having a slight bias here, as the original happens to be one of my favourite compositions ever, however they don’t do too lousy a job in truth. So it lacks the poignantly strained vocals and subtely, but as with Perth, it’s an enjoyable enough a listen, replacing the gentle guitars with booming synths. Check out The Funeral below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
